verses.roman:
āpani nācite yabe prabhura mana haila
sāta sampradāya tabe ekatra karila

synonyms: āpani—personally; nācite—to dance; yabe—when; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mana—mind; haila—became; sāta sampradāya—all the seven parties; tabe—at that time; ekatra karila—combined.
translation: When the Lord Himself wanted to dance, all seven groups combined together.
